Exercício 2

0x7f800000 = 0111 1111 1000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000
	Sinal = 0
	Expoente = 11111111 = 255
	Expoente Real = 255-127=128
	Mantissa = 1,00000000000000000000000

0x007fffff = 0000 0000 0111 1111 1111 1111 1111 1111
	Sinal = 0
	Expoente = 00000000 = 0
	Expoente Real = 0-127=-127
	Mantissa = 1,11111111111111111111111

0x7fffffff = 0111 1111 1111 1111 1111 1111 1111 1111
	Sinal = 0
	Expoente = 11111111 = 255
	Expoente Real = 255-127=128
	Mantissa = 1,11111111111111111111111
